So the answer is **(C) 1**.

The best way to solve it is to make a chart.  Write down the numbers 1 through 5 to represent the houses. Then make rows for each clue: drinks, fruit, shoes, sport, and flowers.

Now, carefully read each clue. Some clues will tell you exactly where something is, like "The person wearing running shoes lives in the third house."  

Other clues will give you relationships, like "The swimmer lives to the left of the milk drinker." Use those relationships to figure out the order.

Keep going, clue by clue, and you'll start to see a pattern emerge.  

Eventually, you'll be able to figure out which house has the lilies!
